commitResults.messageBody:
Reformat existing codebase in IntelliJ IDEA automatically using the code
formatting configuration files.

Update `README.md` to include my own iP information.

Add `LICENSE.md` to specify that my iP is not an open source project (to
prevent others from copying my iP code to use in their own).

Add `CODEOWNERS` file to specify that I own my iP files.

Add `SECURITY.md` and `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` files, lightly modified from
the existing GitHub repository templates.

Add project code formatting and linting configuration files.

Update existing codebase formatting, and project configuration and
documentation files.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-0): rename chatbot from Duke to Kuro
commitResults.messageBody:
Rename all mentions of the chatbot to Kuro from the placeholder name
Duke, except for the section of README preserved from upstream.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-0): add skeletal greet and quit methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Add basic greet and quit methods that just prints to the console the
respective messages.

Update the UI test case to new output, so that the test case passes.

Update chatbot name to Kuro from the placeholder name Duke.

Add initial skeletal version that greets the user and exits.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-1): add command echo to Kuro
commitResults.messageBody:
Add ability for Kuro to echo commands passed to it after the greeting is
displayed. The `bye` command still prints the exit message without
changes.

Add ability for Kuro to echo commands typed in after greeting the user,
while keeping the `bye` command working as before.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-2): add and list tasks for Kuro
commitResults.messageBody:
Add ability to add and read tasks for Kuro. Tasks are not saved after
program termination.

commitResults.messageTitle: test: update test to just exiting Kuro
commitResults.messageBody: Update the test input and expected output to quit on running Kuro.

Add ability to add and read tasks for Kuro. Tasks are not saved after
program termination.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat(Level-3): add mark and unmark tasks as done
commitResults.messageBody:
Add mark and unmark tasks as done to Kuro. Marking multiple tasks in one
go is supported.

Add mark and unmark tasks as done to Kuro. Marking multiple tasks in one
go is supported.
